Content: Dim Forest Ecological Survey (1)

The Dim Forest is, no doubt, the greatest treasure trove in Huanglong, and there is no region that compares to it in terms of species abundance.
Just standing at the entrance of this gate, I could clearly hear the voices of the plants and hear their call.
Even more fortunately, such precious plant data is so close in reach! What the chimpanzee was holding in his hand was exactly what the plantain plant named XXX looked like in the image documents. It was recorded that this fruit, popular among both young and old, had been widely cultivated before the Lament.
However, as a triploid plant, XXX, like most cash crop plants that require breeding techniques, disappeared after the Lament. Information about this fragile species can now be found in some historical literature.
Although regretable this is also the natural law of succession. According to Verina's law, stagnation is one of the most important factors of biological extinction, and this is the inevitable end of XXX in the wild, which has been artificially deprived of its ability to reproduce.
Dim Forest Ecological Survey (2)

Guided by the XXX and the sounds of the plant, I came to this stunningly beautiful large tree with purple branches and leaves.
Judging from the shape of the leaves, it is possible that this plant is a subspecies of Ficus arborvitae. However, the origin of the wonderful purple color on the leaves is unknown, and further research is needed to verify it.
The large tree is perennially cooped up with parenting female orangutans underneath, which makes them sensitive and rabid. To avoid a head-on confrontation, I plucked a large amount of gorilla hair through days of collecting and making it a coat. By such means, I took and effort to get close enough to the big tree and collected samples of some of the leaves.
However, because of the season, no samples of the flowers as well as the fruits of the species were collected, and no pollinating insects were seen in the vicinity. There are still many mysteries to be revealed.
But I am sure that this is the first time this species is discovered. I tentatively named it XXX and made an appointment with it to come back sometime to hear its story of more than a century.
Goodbye, XXX and I'll see you again when the season is right.
Dim Forest Ecological Survey (3)

After bidding farewell to the Xxx, I headed towards the most important goal, the Confinement Woods.
It was a tree that was visually over 200m high, and anyone could smell the aura of great adventure emanating from this giant tree. Its presence seemed to indicate the infinite power of life, and I and Xxx were attracted by its vitality like then afternoon sun. We were involuntarily leaping and cheering.
But the closer we get to the tree, the more anxious the plants sound. Even the duckweed beneath the feet are making strange noises.
I rarely find this phenomenon outside the radiation range of Tacet Fields. Finding the source of this phenomenon may be lead to the reason why the trees throughout the Dim Forest, both the Confinement Woods and the Xxx just now are so huge.
So what am I waiting for? It's better to get up and go now than to sit and talk!
Dim Forest Ecological Survey (4)

Whew, I don't know when the last time was when I had such a strenuous movement.
The shell of the car I stepped on when I jumped down was surprisingly hiding a TD of XXX. It was the first time I saw such a persistent TD, which started to chase as if really enraged. It chased me from the Confinement Woods all the way here before I could get rid of it.

But this is already near the Tacet Field, with soil barren and the plants left with only sounds of pain. There is nothing I can do for plants in this state. I have to cheer up! Decay and extinction are also part of ecology. Nature is not always gentle, and it is my duty to detect and witness it.
Dim Forest Ecological Survey (5)

The environment of the Confinement Woods is even more magical than expected. A unique canopy ecosystem has formed around the branches of this giant tree.
According to my investigation, the tree's branches contain abundant Resonance Energy within. The energy gathered from around the area of the Dim Forest travels from the top of the tree to the entire trunk. Under the catalyst of this energy, such a huge tree was formed. And it is by relying on these energies that the tree reproduces a whole different ecosystem. Probably because of the ferocious roars that come from time to time within the tree, the tree has no signs of activity from large MO or TD. This gives the plants a better chance to flourish and allows the Remnant Mutterfly to exist.
The skills of the Resonator who created this giant tree is very similar to mine. I guess he is also a nature lover. Otherwise, even with the assistance of the sonic instrument at the top of the tree, it is unlikely that such a large and complex giant tree could have been created.
In order to facilitate future expeditions, I made a little fluorescent decoration on the branch of Confinement Woods as a sign. This will make future research expeditions more efficient. So it's time to go, to explore the depths of the Confinement Woods!
Dim Forest Ecological Survey (Conclusion)

Jueyuan: However, most species in the region are in a relatively precarious situation. Take the XXX in the conservation area for example, the species is essentially on the verge of functional extinction and needs timely artificial conservation.
Jueyuan: Besides...
[Hoochief squeaking]
Jueyuan: Bad gorilla! That's not food!
[Hoochief mocking]
Jueyuan: Stop there -- (voice lowering, getting far)

Ministry of Development
Work Brief

159 A. L. Dec. 31
Recorder: Huaijin

The Academy and the Ministry jointly released the latest version of the "Wutheron Leakage Emergency Response Manual", and the foreman said that I knew best about Tacetite energy here, so I should study it first and give the other mine workers some trainings in a couple of days. More than sixty pages of instructions in two days. It should be two weeks at least.
"For personnel, equipment and materials contaminated with radioactive dust, the damage can be reduced by cleaning and decontamination."
 "Contaminated wastewater must be treated by ion exchange and must not be discharged at will."
The people at the Academy must be fools. If this is a manual for miners, they should use simple and straightforward words. Ion exchange and blah blah, miners do not know this.
 Forget it, forget it, sure it's a trouble, but for the sake of the foreman, I will make some outlines of it.
Sigh, overtime work in the holiday. I really hope I'd get a week off after this.
Knell Garden

Even if the darkness of night drowns our footprint, we can and will reach the far, as long as we have the constant courage to explore the unknown.
- to the warriors who dedicate themselves to the long nights

[About the Knell Garden]
Established in 155 A.L., the Knell Garden is meant to remember every warrior who gave his life for human civilization. Every flower in the garden was personally sown and watered by the fifth head of the Midnight Rangers, Jiyan. The flower seeds are specially cultivated by the specially hired botanical researcher Jueyuan, according to the geology and climate in Huanglong, which can guarantee 100% survival rate even in bad weather, symbolizing the indomitable spirit of Huanglong.
When paying condolences, citizens should respect the deceased and do not trample on the sea of flowers. Violators will be taken to Mourn Guards.

Squeaky Delivery Recruitment

Job Title:
[Delivery Driver]
Job Description:
Any age, in possession of any national driving license, able to collect, deliver packages safely, swiftly, accurately as per tasked by the company.
Job Location:
Site pursuant to applicant's wish and actual job demands
Job Time:
9 hours a day, 5 days a week. Starts at 7 a.m. and ends at 7 p.m., with 3 hours in between for rest. Works outside this time are regarded as overtime and subject to double pay.

Pay and Perks:
1. Get paid at piece rate with no upper limit;
2. Complete life insurance included. Carrier vehicle allocated. Accomadation and vocational education provided (including but limited to identification of dangerous objects, Tacetite pollutant neutralization, first aid etc.). Eligible for skill certification;
3. Triple pay for public holiday;
4. works clothes for all season;
5. Collection and Delivery in dangerous areas are fully covered (including and not limited to supply guarantee, armed backup, special escort etc.), which is paid by the company.

Emergency Evacuation Notice

Villagers of Qichi, post personnel at the 9th research area:
Abnormal density of Wutherons is observed recently in the north of Qichi Village (including the 9th research area). There is a great probability of small to medium-sized TD wave, sudden Tacet Fields or other disasters.
For the safety of your lives and property, villagers of Qichi in the receipt of this notice please immediately prepare to evacuate, and do not carry too much supplies. The Midnight Rangers will send a froces to assist you in evacuating as soon as possible.
Repeat, do not carry too much supplies, evacuate quickly!
P. S.: post personnel at the 9th research area, please pay attention to the later notices.

Ancient Banyan "Longwang"

The ancient banyan "Longwang" is located in the northern part of Longwang land in Central Plains. According to the New Botanical Records of Huanglong, the age of Longwang is estimated to be between 1400 and 1500 years, and the tree still stands after Lament. Its roots twist and turn like a pythons and loongs; its gnarled branches resemble sharp claws, showing all the wantonness. In the early days of the Threnodian War, when faced with the TD army of the Crownless, the Huanglong Army and the villagers of Qichi worked together to resist here and achieved a valuable victory. The immovable ancient tree is like the coordinates of the earth and has become a symbol to rely on. As long as Longwang is still here, the Central Plains will be reborn again. In 147 A. L., the inhabitants of Qichi Village, with the help of Tiancheng, restored the old tree and officially named it "Longwang". Kind Reminder: Please carve marks on the trunk or branches. Everyone should be responsible for taking care of the ancient tree.
Journal without signature No. 1

Day 27
The bombing kept on for 3 hours. Then it stopped for 2 hours, and started again for another 3 hours.

Day 28
The bombing kept on for 3 hours. Then it stopped for 2 hours, and started again for another 3 hours. Sanshui tried to stop me from taking note of this. There isn't a routine. But I count the time by watching Gui sigh. He sighs every half an hour. I know his habit, it's always like that.
It's necessary to note the time. There will be the day we get out of here.
Journal without signature No. 2

Day 109
Today there were two loud noises, I couldn't tell what they were. There was a pause in the middle of about two minutes or...... three minutes? When the first noise came, the new bed Gui just built was shaken all apart, sand and dust from the stone cracks overhead clattering off. he was immediately shocked, frozen there. And when the second noise striked, he howled violently all of a sudden.
Sanshui told him to shut up, but he kept howling. Sanshui gave him a slap, told him to not affect others.
I didn't care, though. At the first noise, I was already thinking about my next life. In my next life I want to be a Gulpuff, and I'll prick whoever messes with me, so I don't have to hide in this dull cave.

Day 110
Sanshui said Threnodians could trample hundres of Gulpuffs into pieces in one blow. I said that wouldn't matter. The Gulpuffs would prick his foot.
No sounds heard today.
Journal without signature No. 3

Gui's baby was born at night. The moonlight shone in through the big hole that was blown open, and it was quite bright. Everyone was yakking and trying to name the child, and we finally chose "Changming". The child immediately cried, and then Gui followed, and everyone cried, even Sanshui also wiped his eyes.
Before the roof of the cave was blown open, daylight could not be seen at this place. When we listen to the artillery fire outside, in addition to fear, there was also a little unspeakable...... ease. Now well, people always know the dawn and dusk, the rain and shine. Everyone has decided to live here. I give up on thinking about how the Threnodians will end up. We are good here.

Maybe, in the future, someone will come here for investigation and find "cavemen" or something like that. I'm writing this down because I hope the explorer won't treat us like ancient apes, and make it awkward with all the verifications and research.
We are just villagers who came here for refuge, nothing special, no need to remember us.
Notice of Construction

The construction of the focus array will officially begin on September 10, when the Tacetite Industrial Transportation Station will be responsible for the transfer work. Relevant staff is asked to pay attention to maintaining road safety, close check of supplies, regular monitor of the environment to ensure the safe storage of the Wutherium Fluid.
During the construction process, non-technical staff should stay away from the site, and direct contact with Wutherium Fluid without protection is prohibited. If you feel unwell, please report it in time.

158 A. L. August 30
Beware of Bullies!

Visitors, if you find stray cats at the entrance of the transfer station, please do not feel free to feed or call out to them.
There are two bullies nearby who often approach the staff with the posture of soft relatives and take the opportunity to sneak into the station and hide in the shadows of important equipment. When they are found, they stretch claws and deliberately hurt people. They have become recidivists!
To ensure the safe storage of Tacetite products and your personal safety, please beware of the two bullies and do not be deceived by their appearance.

**We have dedicated members of staff to feed them.
Hotel of Comfort Weekly ~ Issue 100 ~

~ Hotel of Comfort ~
Weekly Read Issue 100 Extra packed edition

*Weekly Fresh News* Bounds of Meeting
The first Flower Tossing Festival in Qichi Village ended successfully. Unlike previous years, in order to commemorate the completion of the village in the north, the village invited many nearby villagers this year to participate in the festival as a way of thanking them for their support.
It is a custom of the Qichi villagers to toss newly picked flowers branchesor into the Pond of Rain Petals in March to let the water feel the vitality of the early spring and to pray that the joy of the new life will reach the hearts of people so they will not be trapped by the sadness of destruction of the Lament.
There is also a small pond near our hotel, so if you are interested, you can also try throwing a handful of flower petals into it when you take a walk after dinner. Although the size of the pond is not as big as the Pond of Rain Petals, but the prayer and joy must be common ~

*Special Afterward* Our Last Farewell
We have been with you for two years and two months without noticing, and our magazine has successfully reached its 100th issue. At the end of this monumental issue, we would like to say goodbye to all of you.
The Lament and the Threnodian War have completely changed the Central Plains, and various sudden disasters have made it difficult for us to resist. At this rate, the Hotel of Comfort will not be able to live up to its name and give travelers a truly safe and comfortable living experience.
But our farewell will not be as sudden as Lament. We will continue to operate for another month, and after the transfer, the building will be preserved and taken over by Tiancheng. As for what will become of it, please stay in the loop!
Jiaping's Diary
Component Analysis for Mists in Hazy Depths

Author: Yanshu
Since the beginning of the "TD Wave" (Years 130-155 ), the fog in the Hazy Depths located at the bottom of the Hukou, the Tiger's Maw, has increased dramatically, and the Academy has detected a large number of Wutheron activity signals at this location.
The purpose of this exploration is to continue to investigate the fog, and to rescue the people trapped inside. Members are as follows:
Special Operations Company, Vanguard Battalion, Huanglong Midnight Rangers Regiment (111162)
Geological Exploration Team, Huaglong Academy
......
Analysis of Results Regarding the Investigation of the Unknown Fog:
This exploration collected samples of the mists in the tunnel connecting the Hukou Mine and the Hazy Depths, and analyzed them in the field using the [Simple Spectrometer] carried by the team. Based on the results of this test, we speculate that the mist appears to be a biological component, with a composition similar to the scale powder on the wings of lepidopteran insects, showing non-toxic, low-temperature properties.
We infer that the danger of the mists come from its low temperature:
①	Condensation of water vapor due to low temperatures can greatly impede vision and cause investigators to lose judgment of direction in the foggy area.
②	Low temperatures can directly affect the health status of investigators, prolonged hypothermia leads to reduced physical vitality and the inability to respond to hazards in a timely manner.
However, our current investigation has not yet identified the anomalous sound coming from within the fogs proper, and considering that the unknown sound may lead to panic among the people nearby and affect the operations of the mine, it is recommended that the above information be withheld from the public.

Below is the personnel missing recently:
Chameng
Kuopu
Leyun
Songning
......
(Relatives to these persons experienced imaginary voices to various degrees. The contents of the voices are summonings to enter the Hazy Depths at the bottom of the mine. It is suspected that these voices concern the anamolies in the mists. Further investigation is currently impossible due to the lockdown of the Depths. All staff is advised to avoid mists and suspend mining works around the Hazy Depths.

Safety Code of Hukou Mines

Several new articles are added to the Safety Code of Hukou Mines: 43. Do not believe in rumors about voices. You should not and will not hear any strange voices in the mines, especially those of your relatives.(It is impossible a passed relative could talk to you) 44. Do not near the fog at any time, even if someone is calling you in the fog. 45. If you hear any strange voices, ignore it.Stop any work you are doing immediately and attend the infirmary. We will provide treatments for you, mentally and physically.
Notice on the rumors circulating within the mine about "calling on relatives"

Recently there have been a lot of rumors in the mine, the source of which is a number of cases of missing miners that have not yet been resolved. The mine understands everyone's feelings, but for the sake of production safety, please maintain a good working environment, do not spread rumors, and do not believe in rumors. As of now the Midnight Rangers have been involved in the investigation of the incidents, so please wait patiently for the investigation results.
Records No.1 of the Prospecting Team into the Foggy Pit

How long have we been in the mist, seconds, or minutes? I haven't calmed myself, as heat loss and dread thrill me. I feel like I was freshly picked out from a freezer, curled in stiffness, unable to think.
What is that... what have we gone through... where are we now?
Them, my companions taken by the mists. Where are them?
...
I will keep recording. That is how I keep my brain functioning, until I find the answers.
Records No.2 of the Prospecting Team into the Hazy Depths

Chi'su left the backpack to me, and I knew he was ready to sacrifice. I was afraid that he would make it back, and even more afraid that he would be back something else ...... I don't want to wield a Ranger weapon against a comrade.
What's more, it was this one that he gave me.
Records No.3 of the Prospecting Team into the Hazy Depths

Well...... I think that was Chisu's voice...... he said "It's okay", just in the calm way like he always does when comforting me......
My mood calmed down unexpectedly with his voice, but I can't hold my hands from shaking.
It wasn't him......
The leader announced to us that the advance team had completed their mission, and that it was time to strike back.
Because of the need to carry weapons for two, the record will not be continued later.
Goodbye, my future comrades, I hope these records will help you.
A joke

Ming's mum asked him what kind of work he wanted to do when he was grown up. Ming said he wanted to be a mine worker. Mum did not understand why Ming, a lazy little boy wanted to be a mine worker. Ming said:" because if I am a mine worker, the work is mine. I can skip work whenever I want."

Remarks: "Even if you are a mine worker, the work is not yours. You can't skip it."
Terminal transcript

Tan: You really went to the mine to work the night shift?
Jing: I decided to find myself a job and save myself before I lost water and food at home.
Tan: But it's not as bad as I thought. I've been staring at the "big elevator" going up and down to kill time, and it went for 49 times this night.
Tan: Isn't that a bit too frequent?
Tan: I heard that the mine recently reduced the night shifts. How could there be so much up and downs?
Jing: I'm not sure. Let me use my skill specialized for night security to see the situation.
Jing: That's not right......
Tan: What's wrong, what's wrong?
Jing: This elevator isn't taking anyone. I've looked at the switches on several floors, and there's no one around...... No, I have to go out and take a look.
Tan: Hey hey hey, you cannot act as you will. If we are in a story, it could be anything waiting for you outside.
Jing: No, now that I have taken this job, I must not only take care of my own safety. And you, on the other hand, should listen to science, as a so-called Tiancheng's new generation. You are talking even more like an old square......
Jing: Besides, maybe it's a mechanical failure, or my colleagues are playing a prank? After all, the work in the mine is so boring, maybe they agreed to give me, a newcomer, a "surprise"?
A-tan: You're exactly like the protagonist of a horror story! Good luck, I will also pray to Suiguang that you will be alright......

Fault Description: Unusual increase in steel wire wearing and break, which resulted in failure of linkage between cable car bodies and failure in the normal operation of cable cars.
Treatment: Steel wires replaced.
Reason: Pulling wheels, guiding pulleys and speed governors all checked, and no reason found. Inapproriate operation suspected.
Advice: If I should catch anyone messing around with cargo and getting overloaded on the cable cars, I will hang him on the cable and give him a taste of OVERLOAD!
Handled by: Cheng
Note of an engineer

To Cheng:
I made clear what the problem reported by the new guy on night watch was.
Sure enough, just like you said, it's not a spooky phenomenon at all, it's just that someone has adjusted the induction threshold of the lift lower, and now even a gust of wind can make this sensitive big guy move.
Young people nowadays are alwasy so suspicous like our last generation......
But here the repair still need your help. I debugged it for quite a while, but there's still an error of 21 grams.
Warning on Wutherium Fluid can

Don't treat canned Wutherium Fluid as an average fluid!
1. It won't be sold at a common market.
2. It won't stand impacts during transport.
3. It cannot be stored for long time.
4. The most important part is, don't open a canned Wutherium Fluid like a food can. This could kill!

Tacetite radiation
Tacetite radiation influence
Tacetite long-term radiation illness
Tacetite disease cognitive disorder
Tacetite illness cure
......
Sound of Stone

Who says you have to have a musical instrument to play!
During my work in the mine, I always heard some strange sounds, and at first I thought it was the "voice" that the rumors said...... but then I found out that these strange sounds were actually coming from Tacetite, and what's more amazing is that they have their own rhythm!
When Tacetite is transformed to Wutherium Radiation in Resonance Boxes, part of the frequency domain can be captured by the human ear. And the shape of the Tacetite cut, the nature of the ore will all affect how this sound wave is played into a melody.
I have organized the sounds recorded over the years and rearranged them into a song, which is this "Sound of Stone".
I hope that one day, this new way of playing will gain everyone's affection.
Business Advertisement for the Port

Port Gunchao was established in 132 A. L. It is mainly engaged in the business of domestic and foreign cargo agency and ship agency for raw Tacetie, energy industrial products, consumer sound materials, etc. With the world's top container management system and large ship docking facilities, Port Gunchao is the largest comprehensive hub port and container trunk port in Huanglong area.
We have long been cooperating closely with the Hukou Mine and the Pioneer Association, with fair and transparent pricing and excellent reputation in the industry.
We welcome people from all industries to conduct business negotiations.

                                                                                              Business Office, Port Gunchao
Working Journal at the Port

Working Journal at the Port Author Unknown It was about late one afternoon last month when I was taking inventory in the yard and I looked down and noticed that the spider had made a web. Just as I was about to clean it up as usual...... I noticed that the web had such a regular shape, a precisely calculated polygon that expanded step by step, that I was fascinated by it! I had heard a beautiful legend that TDs are attracted to similar frequencies, and at that moment I felt like I had been struck by something too! Oh, maybe the spider had a similar "frequency" to me? In the end, I was careful not to break the spider's web, hoping that no one else would find it......

𝘕𝘰𝘵𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘍𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘰 𝘑𝘪 𝘛𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘓𝘢𝘣𝘰𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘴

Chap. 13, 𝘕𝘰𝘵𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘑𝘪 𝘛𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘍𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘰 𝘊𝘢𝘵𝘢𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘩𝘪𝘤 𝘋𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘈.𝘓. 104
A revist as part of the effort to demystify the reason Ji Ting collapsed ended in no new useful information.
Remains on site, Wutheron traces, and oral records of survivors... they add up only to a still sparse collection.
Judging from the mere result, without taking into account the reasons behind: if this is what happens to the most advanced research institute of all humanity, I can't imagine it should happen again.
Instinct tells me this wasn't a pure catatrophe of accident.

A Ji Ting facility that lasted until the final moment, upholding an important responsibility even after the catastrophe, that is, directing Huanglong residents to immigrate to the mountains safely. Having fulfilled its last mission, it is almost perfection, as an artificial creation.

Chap. 7, 𝘕𝘰𝘵𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘑𝘪 𝘛𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘍𝘪𝘦𝘭𝘥𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘰 𝘊𝘢𝘵𝘢𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘩𝘪𝘤 𝘋𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘈.𝘓. 104 
A simple settlement that was constructed on a basis of a military facility became no longer habitable completely as of the catastrophe.
The environment remains hostile. Thick fog is frequently present, while Wutheron indicator shows anomalities now and then.
As a possible result of regular plunder by exiles active around here, nothing valuable is found in the area.
Cemetery of the Lost

In 157 A. L., the largest TD offensive "Tides of Beasts" appeared with its threat pointed at the heart of Tiancheng.
For the sake of home to humanity, all soldiers of Huanglong's army took their best and unified their minds to resist the enemy from the last front.
Among the forces, the Vanguard Battalion of Midnight Rangers dived deep into the core area in the wild in an effort to exterminate the enemy with a mobile approach. It cost them a wretching price to turn the tide in which human had been only passively defending, into one that will promise Huanglong's ultimate victory.
In our deepest memories the 306 warriors left in the battle of Tides of Beasts are mourned and monumented at this cemetery.

                                                                                                                                                                ALL MEN OF HUANGLONG

P. S.: 159 A. L., the gathering of mourners and their condensed memories after the establishment of this cemetery has caused a turbulence of Wutherons in this area that became a minor Tacet Field. Damage to larger or smaller degrees were done to all parts of the cemetery. Despite a plan to repair, it is in people's hope to keep the damage marks as a constant alert and a remainder of crisis.
Battle Log No. 6010: Entering Autumn

It's the fifth day of deployment in the battlefield, and I have finally time to jot down something.
I was arranged clerk for the XXX. For the whole the 30 people in the XXX, I have to record everything from their food, their hydration, to their rest, their possession, all while the Geiger Counters beep all day and shells drop near us now and then.
I don't know if fortune favors me or it doesn't, because a bomb hit the shelter I dug and burnt my pack down to ashes, while I was out transmitting the order and spared of it. Nevertheless, the absense of sleeping bags and clothes for change in late Autumn became a worry, leaving me in frustration of how I would make it through the winter.
The deputy in charge of logistics was a warmhearted man, who offered me his new sleeping bag and clothes, and went to use mildewed spare supply himself. I only took the bag and promised to return it to him when we are resupplied. He said nothing, neither took back the clothers; instead he smiled, and then left. I didn't care to chase because of the cold in the night. Could give things back tomorrow.
Battle Log No. 6010: Battle for Point 91.7

11 nights witnessed the battle for the 91.7 highland. Our XXX lost 16 men, including our deputy. 7 serious injuries and 8 mild injuries. The battle progressed as follows:
In late November, the enemy assaulted our 9.17 highland, which was not named. For days of nights of fighting and contending, most of the surface of the highland was occupied by the enemy. On October 27, we received the command to go in to battle and back up friendly forces.
Under fire cover, our force launched 6 strikes on the enemy with 8 hours, all of which failed to drived the enemy away from the highland.
Early 28 morning, the enemy launched an unresultful counter-strike with covers of cannon firing.
From Octboer 28 until Nov 6, the control ot the highland was transferred back and forth a few times, but there weren't decisive results for both sides.
Night Nov 6, my force was replaced by a friendly one which would take on our duties due to the severe headcount loss of more than 70%.
Summary of Battle:
The loss of my force was predominantly done by close-range fire. This, for one, proves the defense insights about indirect fire circulated within the army; for another, it makes the case for the underpreparation of my force with respect to close-range crossfire. Detailed battle review is attached hereafter.
Battle Log No. 6010: Reorganize

It is November 8 today. We retreated to our rear for rearmament as per the order. The rumbling of cannons keeps coming through from 91.7. No doubt that highland is to be the key to the whole battle. The side that takes it takes control.
On that highland, which hardly covers some ground, flesh and blood have become the strongest defense lines. All the steels knee before them.
I am glad I didn't borrow the deputy's new clothes, for at least he can be taken home with pride.
He told me a tale, which he said was told by his grandfather, that when one passes, his homecoming soul will be hitched with breezes to where he belongs. Now it's late night, I wonder if my comrades are on their way to return.
Battle Log No. 6010: Departure again

On Nov 15, we met the backup we waited for: two recruits. Together with the 12 men left, we formed a squad. Since we kept the establishment of XXX, my title of acting deputy squad leader was nominally acting deputy XXX leader.
The battle at 91.7 drained our reserves. It's time the undermanned forces, that is us, be sent back to the front. We are infiltrating into enemies' rear. As soon as the encircle is done, we will be positioned to annihilate the enemy.
The enemy has realized this. They are planning a desperate sally intended to break our front and encircle our flanks in turn. The fate of this decisive battle is soon to be seen.
Battle Log No. 6010: This may be my last

Female Voice: "Mum, it's the 47th day of this battle, and I'm turning 22."
Female Voice: "47 days, in which I became an acting leader from a common recruit."
Female Voice: "Enemies flooded towards us like cockroaches without stop."
Female Voice: "And we didn't hesitate to squash them, like always."
[pause for a while, deep breath]
Female Voice: "Mum, I'll be back. They will take me back. Just don't lock the window."
Incineranur Security Administration

1. No trespassing for unauthorized personnel in Incineranur. Vialotors at their own risk. Authorized personnel should abide by the code of conduct.

2. Operations within the area of Incineranur should be authorized and done with proper certifications.

3. Protective Equipment should be carefully used before entrance into Incineranur. Resonator should simultaneously hold and wear insulators and wave absorbers; non-Resonators should refrain from entering unless necessary. Wear additional, correct protection in extraordinary cases.

4. Operation in the area of Incineranur should not exceed 3 hours. In the cases of any physical of mental discomfort during operation, leave immediately and seek medical inspection.

5. Personnel involved in long-term operations in the area should receive regular mental assessments to avoid potential sanity detoriation.
Footnotes of Time - 91

That little girl, Annalica, said there might be "pocket piano" here. We should have arrived at what her coordinate indicates.
But we found only dolls blown to pieces, model cars that don't run after a hard searching effort. We are not even seeing a trace of piano.
Though that kid can always find bizarre gadgets in plies of antiquities, I doubt the existence of this "pocket piano".
Footnotes of Time - 92

It is wet lately. There might be reverse rain, so I found a weapon remains for cover.
I met a pair of brother and sister there resting. Two small kids, on their alert to strangers. Looked like home runaways.
I was going to call Morn Guards from the camp to take them back, but they jumped over to me, and almost bumped into my brim.
"Pleasem uncle, don't send to take us. My sister and I just wanted to go and see the flower fields." The boy with a larger size looked at me sincerely, getting me in a dilemma.
I gave in at the end. Who's not curious when he's young? I hadn't found much at that time, so why not help them a little. I'd just take it as a trial of luck at the Incineranur.
Footnotes of Time - 93

We stopped at the edge of the Incineranur and the two kids nodded to each other as if to confirm something. Then the boy took out a small, delicate box from his backpack and hesitated for just a moment before casting the contents of the box into Incineranur.
Soon, the long apparatus melted into nothing in the burning heat, and when I turned my head, the two kids were wailing.
Sigh, I traveled all over the world fearing hardly anything, only children crying. Good thing I took the blown doll in my treasure box. I took it out and soothed the kids from crying.
Although this old toy did not get into the tower, it didn't go wasted.
Footnotes of Time - 94

On the way of sending the children back, Annalica sent a very low-resolution picture through, said it was the photo of the "pocket piano" she took much effort to find.
Surprisingly,...... it was the thing that was just thrown into the Incineranur, a historical treasure! Turned into ashes right before my eyes!
"That is grandfather and grandmother's love token." The little girl said.
"Indeed! Grandpa said that during the war, he and grandma were scattered by the crowd and the place where they separated was just the location of the flower sea. He also said......" said the boy, about to cry again, "he said that if one day he too left, we should put the pocket piano in the flower sea so he could play for grandma again."
"But...... but I heard dad say something about this thing selling for a good price, just today! He was going to sell it, sob..."
How can the value of antiques be measured in terms of money? In that case, I have to thank the two little kids for allowing me to witness the instantaneous glow of antiques blooming in this era.
Footnotes of Time - 95

After reading my metric records, Annalica exclaimed that it was a waste.
Perhaps in her opinion, the only way to realize the true value of an ancient object is to incorporate it into the Abyssturrim.
If possible, I really hope that this little girl can step out of Abyssturrim and make sense of the real world. She will become part of the footnotes of history, together with all the metrologists.

In 103 A.L., unknown Loong-shaped creature was dug out at Chengxiao. Mountain. Its signs of life being unclear, the study into it was code-named "Sui Guang".
All kinds of detecting and scanning efforts failed to see its inner construction. ■■■■■■■ might be possible.
Sui Guang was awakened in 106 A.L. for the reason of ■■■■■■■. It was sapient and comprehensible to communications. Jiushang, the commander-in-chief made a successful conversation with it and agreed on the strikeback plan Operation Real Loong. The war on Threnodian saw a major opportunity.
In 107 A.L., Sui Guang assisted human in the defeat of the Crownless at the Norfall Barrens. It was witnessed possessing the capability to absorb powers of Threnodians. An analysis of the energy remains on the battlefield shows the possibility of ■■■■■■■.
Personal Journal

Date: 157 A.L. Jan. 8
Content: Captain had a word with me, again, today. He wanted a decisive opinion from me, as a technological backbone - whether we should proceed with the survey. Me, him, and virtually everyone else knows that this canal means so much and that we have paid so much for it, if we stop here, the fruits of all these years go to waste. But if we process on, the further price is perhaps lives... I can't convince myself, nor my teammates, who are so frightful of the TD waves.
Survey Report

Date of Work: 155 A.L. Oct. 11 Work Summary: A survey unit distribution map is made for the primary locationing of the canal. Encountered a small TD wave during imaging info collection. Two members slightly injured after a timely support from the Ranger special company, despite serious damage done to survey devices. Backup devices expected to arrive in one week, before which all survey works are paused. Notes and Remarks: Raw mines of unknown rock are found in the area, which demands for further digging and testing of its structure and nature to weigh its value. Dangers are considerable for the construction and survey works in this area. Should any exceptional conditions arise, works should be immediately stopped, personnel be withdrawn, and Midnight Rangers be notified.
Camp Notice

[Latest Notice] Date: 157 A.L. Content: Due to the frequent occurrence of TD waves and abnormal Wutheron density, the sculpting of Suiguang and the excavation of the canal are suspended as of now. All personnel of the Ministry of Development and the Midnight Ranger are ordered to withdraw from the area. The restart time is yet to be determined. [Outdated Notice] Date: 154 A.L. Content: The access to the Gorges of Spirit was knocked through today, where Midnight Ranger special companies met accumulated TD waves of extraordinary danger. The numbers of death, severe injury and missing is yet to be recorded as they are too high. Jiyan was appointed temoporary commander-in-chief after his predecessor's heroic sacrifice. [[Outdated Notice] Date: 140 A.L. Content: Commissioned by the Ministry, a Midnight Ranger special company will be responsible for the study and clearing of Gorges of Spirit land lots to allow for the Ministry to enter the Gorges for a more detailed survey. Primary expectations show the access to the Gorges should be open before 150 A.L..
Lab Report for XXX

Rigidity: 6 degree
Density: 3.0-3.5g/cm³
Compressive Strength: 3000-5000kg/cm³

The sample is named Xxx, which has a fine structure, good rigidity and compressive strength performances, and a decent chemical stability. It is capable of standing extreme temperature changes.
Xxx is widely distributed in the Gorges of Spirit with a large presence. Therefore its mining is convenient, with a moderate probability of finding large lots. It is an excellent construction material, suitable for large sculptures, outer walls and hard overlayings.
Battle Report against TD waves at the Gorges of Spirit

Date: 154 A. L.
Content: In the operation to recapture the Gorges of Spirit, the Midnight Ranger was positioned in extremely adverse conditions of the commander-in-chief mortality and force mismatch. However, with the outstanding service of Jiyan, one of our warriors, the only one special company left managed to resist large-scale TD waves for 3 days and stayed the ground until the major forces came to their backup. The forces were then coordinated and directed to beat the TD successfully. Most of the investigation results were thus preserved.
Gorges of Spirit Investigation Report

[Noise from Communicator]
Yesterday set up a communication with the family. My daughter muttered several times that she wanted to see the big waterfall and the big turtle, and that she wanted to see them in person, at where they were.
Oh my good Lady...... I bargained for a long time before she agreed to just look at the photos.
It is strange that this place is not much damaged by the Tides of Beasts, maybe because this big guy sitting in the lake.
I also have to be careful not to startle it.

皇龙重建史

新历110年  神兽岁光击败鸣式，一位名叫辛夷的少女借着点点火种，重塑人们心中的希望。她在一个临时避难所发表了振奋人心的演讲，重建皇龙的热潮于各地涌起。辛夷带领大家围绕神兽沉睡之地乘霄山开启了重建的第一步。

新历115年  经过鸣域演算中枢的推算，确定了新都选址，即如今的天城所在地。

新历116年  新年第一天，新都天城动工建设。

新历120年  天城完成了第一阶段建设，大部分居民从各地迁居天城，此后数十年天城的基础建设陆续完善。

新历134年  天城首次遭遇幻象兽潮的袭击，此后幻象兽潮频发，至今仍是威胁皇龙的巨大危险之一。

新历155年  为鼓舞人心，举办了皇龙四杰的表彰仪式。同年，与神兽岁光产生共鸣的今汐，成为新任龙主。

新历157年  皇龙遭遇重建以来规模最大的幻象袭击，被称为“巨浪兽潮”，此役付出惨重代价，最终由今汐唤醒岁光，才保住了重建的天城。

如今，皇龙正从创伤中恢复，天城已成为所有皇龙人的希望之所。
Dumpling Coupon

Tiancheng Cuisine Festival Award - Dumpling Coupon Take this coupon to Panhua Restaurant to be redeemed for 5 servings of dumplings. Subject to availability. Validity: Oct 10 - Nov 10, 159 A. L. Note: This award may not be liquidated, returned, or replaced. Please keep with care. Anomalous notes: My Lady! Expired.:(
Secret Journal No. 1

That Suiguang guy, recently could not be reached again.
Well...... could it be that I tempted it with a dumpling yesterday and made it angry?
Then next time before I go to Chengxiao Mountain to visit it, I'll go to Aunt Panhua's to buy some dumplings.
Oh, no, can Suiguang really eat dumpling? Hey hey, We'll see next time.
Secret Journal No. 2

Today there is once again a temporary memory gap, and occasionally a faint sound can be heard, like...... Suiguang.
This feeling is like inadvertently drowning, with the body continuing to sink, the waters gradually isolating sounds from the outside world, the sense of suffocation enveloping the whole body.
When I tell the matter to the Suiguang, it always says it is my hallucinations. Hum, must be perfuming me again.
Minutes of Mourn Guard Commander's Murder

日期：新历159年
机密性：S级
案件纪要：
新历159年，前晓卫团长叙观于中枢指挥厅外围遇刺，经抢救无效身亡。
经调查，现场存在明显打斗痕迹，当晚有多人看到火光，并伴随爆炸声，根据残留数据分析，嫌疑人为具备异能力的共鸣者。
晓卫巡防小队赶到时，嫌疑人已消失，封锁全城入口均未发现可疑人员，推测嫌疑人拥有异于常人的移动手段。
叙观团长手中残留了红色碎片，疑为线索，但因碎片过小，暂时无法锁定目标。
兹事体大，建议暂时不公开案件细节，转为秘密调查。

今汐的批注：
同意。叙观团长深受信赖，此事恐动摇人心，造成恐慌，务必做好安抚工作。
修复中的画作

长达400厘米，宽30厘米的画作，多处损毁，难辨画面。
左侧有三处修复痕迹，已修复部分呈现出街市祥和热闹的景象，门庭若市，车水马龙，闭目聆听宛若置身其间，嘈杂熙攘的人声清晰可闻。
修复记录

修复日期：新历158年
修复人：代号马良
修复记录：
这批从旧日遗迹挖掘出的画作还算保存完善，损毁点仅有47处。
这幅长卷画作有点意思，用横版绘卷方式记录了某个地区的生活方式，其中竟有众人闻所未闻的东西，若是修复完成，必定能窥见悲鸣前的某些时光残片吧。


匿名的回复：
左边第三个摊位上的食物看起来好好吃的样子，记下来找攀花阿姨试着做一下好了。
啊，还有第六个摊位门口的摆件，是……玩具吗？
这个地区的人真有趣啊！希望下次节庆能在天城展览这幅画！
第171号修复品

横向长卷，烟波浩渺、层峦叠嶂的水墨作品。
得益于陈皮先生提供的悲鸣前画作照片，该作品修复进程顺利高效。
龙主赐名《闻野》，计划于新历160年全城展览。
第281号修复品

泛黄的照片。夕阳的余晖被山峦吞噬，群鸟盘旋，人群蜂拥逃难，世界兵荒马乱。
推测拍摄时间为悲鸣发生时，这张照片让当代人类看见了灾难的缩影。
历史洪流之下，当居安思危，勿忘抗争之火种。
龙主赐名《无声的战争》，计划于新历160年全城展览。
Comments

1: The milk of Morricow tastes extraordinary! It's a little spicy, a little numb, and a little grassy bitter, so maybe we can replace the ingredients of the salty milk tea with this. I have a feeling that this milk tea will be a big hit! If anyone is also interested in the "Hot and Spicy Milk Tea", please leave a comment and I will come back to count the number of people and hold a tasting event in Tiancheng. Maybe we'll mass produce it.
2: I will drink, I will drink! This is so addictive.
3: My life is going to doom if can't drink Hot and Spicy Milk Tea...
4: You must hold a tasting event, because my whole family will be ordering!
日记一则

马岫：画家先生，这幅画是？
画家：送给您的别礼，是岫先生您离世时的场面。
马岫：哈哈哈哈！这么别开生面的别礼，您真是位奇人。
画家：我还以为您多少会有些生气。
马岫：有了小女后，我的脾气简直好得不得了。
画家：说起令爱，她看起来倒是个软弱的人呢。
马岫：您怎么会这样认为？她向来是勇敢的孩子。
画家：她不喜欢“马小芳”这个名字。
马岫：这能说明什么？
画家：说明她连面对自己的勇气都缺乏。
马岫：面对自己可不是简单的事啊。我了解我的孩子，她会成为最勇敢的英雄的。
画家：如果她本有机会拯救您，却因为软弱的本性，错过了那个关键时刻呢。
马岫：……
马岫：画家先生，你是认真的？
画家：万分认真。
马岫：画家先生，能见识您那番神奇的卜命本领，是我的荣幸。但在这点上，我想您错了。
画家：关于您的离世？
马岫：不，是关于我的孩子。
马岫：如果真如您所言，真有那样的时刻，那我的离开，想必就是她的英雄之路的起点吧。
画家：为什么呢？
马岫：我已经说过原因了。
画家：嗯？
马岫：我了解我的孩子，总有一天，她会成为最勇敢的英雄。
画家：岫先生，您也是位奇人呢……那就让我们拭目以待吧。
